briefdescription.para: This function is called by the application when a message that requires processing by the ESL Server is received.

briefdescription.para: Register a callback function with the ESL Server, this function will send events to the application layer if configured.

memberdef.name: EslsWriteCback

briefdescription.para: ATTS write callback for ESL Server. Use this function as a parameter to SvcEslCbackRegister().
